Name: War Tribes
Weaknesses: Heavily relies on pure brute force of their infantry in most cases.

Name: Central Kingdoms
Strengths: Excellent late heavy infantry and cavalry.
Description: Play as the reclaiming Realm of Masendor of the Central Kingdoms. The previous chaos brought much destruction to the realm. Still fractured in half, you will need to take care of the rebels to unite the kingdom. With feudalism as the cultural backbone, your kingdom can set up to be efficient in both offence and defence. Conquer the Central Realms and beyond to become the cornerstone of the civilised world or perish against the barbarian hordes.

Name: Homeward Hordes
Strengths: Highly resistant. Immune to mind status effects.
Description: Play as the reawakening Land of the Death.

Name: New World Settlers
Weaknesses: No native troops or leaders of its own.

Name: Oasis Commonwealth
Weaknesses: Relies on magical powers to compete in late period.

Name: Doll Family
Weaknesses: Statistically weak and lack powerful long-ranged unit.
Description: Play as the infuriating Doll Family.

Name: Highland Clans
Strengths: Superb shock units for all periods.
Weaknesses: Has no air units. Most units focus on offence rather than defence.

Name: Cactus Realms
Description: Play as the fractured Majala Empire.

Name: Maritime Republics
Weaknesses: Most units are relatively weak in melee combat strength

Name: Wee Alliance
Strengths: Numerous and versatile. Capable early units.
Description: Play as the emerging Wee Alliance of the Pamat Forest, formed of rabbitmen, snails, and eagles. These critters of the once peaceful forest know little of true warfare and technology, but they will do their best to eradicate any unrightful invader. You will have to pick a choice. To maintain the simple happiness of life or steer toward the efficiency of civilisation to conquer the world for yourself.
